archimate:Principle.name: Open Governance
archimate:Principle.documentation: A governance model in which the Governance Authority is open to public participation, operates with full transparency, and does not favor any particular contributor or constituency. The Sovrin Foundation operates under an Open Governance model.

properties.value: (c) 2019 by Sovrin Foundation. This work is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution- ShareAlike 4.0 International License (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/).
